alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Menominee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 9:34PM EDT until April 18 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Michigan...Wisconsin... Menominee River near Niagara affecting Menominee, Marinette, Dickinson and Florence Counties. Menominee River near McAllister affecting Menominee and Marinette Counties. Menominee River near Vulcan affecting Menominee, Marinette and Dickinson Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan...Wisconsin... Menominee River near Florence affecting Dickinson, Florence and Iron Counties. For the Menominee River...including Florence, Vulcan, Niagara, McAllister...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Menominee River near Vulcan. * WHEN...From Friday morning to late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Structures along the river along Homestead Road and Sturgeon Way Road may start to be impacted by floodwaters. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 13.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 16.5 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.0 feet on 04/25/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning.
